<script>
  // Start GA Ecommerce
  var glegem =
    glegem ||
    function () {
      ;(window["glegem"].q = window["glegem"].q || []).push(arguments)
    }

  glegem("OnCheckoutStepLoaded", function (data) {
    switch (data.StepId) {
      case data.Steps.LOADED:
        break
      case data.Steps.CONFIRMATION:
        if (data.IsSuccess && !data.IsPageReload) {
          var totalCartDiscount = 0
          var totalOriginalCartDiscount = 0
          for (i = 0; i < data.details.discounts.length; i++) {
            if (data.details.discounts[i].discountTypeId == 1) {
              totalCartDiscount = totalCartDiscount + data.details.discounts[i].customerPrice
              totalOriginalCartDiscount =
                totalOriginalCartDiscount + data.details.discounts[i].price
            }
          }

          // Start of GA Ecommerce;
          ;(function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
            i["GoogleAnalyticsObject"] = r
            ;(i[r] =
              i[r] ||
              function () {
                ;(i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
              }),
              (i[r].l = 1 * new Date())
            ;(a = s.createElement(o)), (m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0])
            a.async = 1
            a.src = g
            m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
          })(window, document, "script", "https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js", "ga")

          ga("create", "UA-********-*", "auto")

          ga("require", "ecommerce")

          ga("ecommerce:addTransaction", {
            id: data.OrderId,
            affiliation: "Global-E",
            revenue: data.details.totalProductsPrice - totalOriginalCartDiscount,
            shipping: data.details.discountedShippingPrice,
            tax: data.details.totalVAT,
            currency: data.details.currency
          })

          for (i = 0; i < data.details.products.length; i++) {
            ga("ecommerce:addItem", {
              id: data.OrderId,
              name: data.details.products[i].name,
              sku: data.details.products[i].sku,
              category: data.details.products[i].categories.length
                ? data.details.products[i].categories[0].name
                : "",
              price: data.details.products[i].price,
              quantity: data.details.products[i].quantity,
              currency: data.details.currency
            })
          }
          ga("ecommerce:send")
        }
    }
  })
  // End of GA Ecommerce

  // Start WKND tag;
  ;(function (d) {
    var e = d.createElement("script")
    e.src = d.location.protocol + "//tag.wknd.ai/6791/i.js"
    e.async = true
    d.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(e)
  })(document)

  var global_line_items = []

  for (var i = 0; i < data.details.products.length; i++) {
    global_line_items.push({
      product_id: data.OrderID,
      sku: data.details.products[i].sku,
      price: data.details.products[i].price,
      quantity: data.details.products[i].quantity
    })
  }

  window.top.bouncex = window.top.bouncex || []
  window.top.bouncex.push([
    "conversion",
    {
      order_id: data.OrderId,
      email: data.details.customerEmail,
      phone: data.details.CustomerInfo.BillingAddress.Phone1,
      goal: "g-purchase",
      currency: data.details.currency,
      total_discount: data.details.totalDiscountsPrice,
      tax: data.details.totalVAT,
      shipping: data.details.discountedShippingPrice,
      amount: data.details.totalProductsPrice - totalOriginalCartDiscount,
      pay_method: data.details.paymentMethodName,
      item: global_line_items
    }
  ])
</script><script src="https://tag.wknd.ai/6791/i.js" async=""></script>

  (async function() {
    try {

      const blockVersion = "v3"
      if (blockVersion != "v3") {
        return 
      }

      let metaErrorFlag = false;
      if (metaErrorFlag) {
        return
      }

      // Parse metafields as JSON
      const metafields = {};

      // Process metafields in JavaScript
      let savedRulesArray = [];
      for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(metafields)) {
        if (value) {
          for (const prop in value) {
            // avoiding Object.Keys for performance gain -- no need to make an array of keys.
            savedRulesArray.push(value);
            break;
          }
        }
      }

      const metaTag = document.createElement('meta');
      metaTag.id = 'easygift-rules'; 
      metaTag.content = JSON.stringify(savedRulesArray);
      metaTag.setAttribute('itemid', 'cnVsZXNfJF8xNzUwMTcwODM4');
  
      document.head.appendChild(metaTag);
      } catch (err) {
        
      }
  })();

  <script type="text/javascript" defer="">

    (function () {
      try {
        window.EG_INFO = window.EG_INFO || {};
        

          var rawPriceString = "17.718.000";
    
          rawPriceString = rawPriceString.trim();
    
          var normalisedPrice;

          function processNumberString(str) {
            // Helper to find the rightmost index of '.', ',' or "'"
            const lastDot = str.lastIndexOf('.');
            const lastComma = str.lastIndexOf(',');
            const lastApostrophe = str.lastIndexOf("'");
            const lastIndex = Math.max(lastDot, lastComma, lastApostrophe);

            // If no punctuation, remove any stray spaces and return
            if (lastIndex === -1) {
              return str.replace(/[.,'\s]/g, '');
            }

            // Extract parts
            const before = str.slice(0, lastIndex).replace(/[.,'\s]/g, '');
            const after = str.slice(lastIndex + 1).replace(/[.,'\s]/g, '');

            // If the after part is 1 or 2 digits, treat as decimal
            if (after.length > 0 && after.length <= 2) {
              return `${before}.${after}`;
            }

            // Otherwise treat as integer with thousands separator removed
            return before + after;
          }

          normalisedPrice = processNumberString(rawPriceString)

          window.EG_INFO["44283860287661"] = {
            "price": `${normalisedPrice}`,

            const lastApostrophe = str.lastIndexOf("'");

            if (lastIndex === -1) {

            // Extract parts

            const after = str.slice(lastIndex + 1).replace(/[.,'\s]/g, '');

            if (after.length > 0 && after.length <= 2) {

          var rawPriceString = "17.718.000";
    
          rawPriceString = rawPriceString.trim();
    
          var normalisedPrice;

          function processNumberString(str) {
            // Helper to find the rightmost index of '.', ',' or "'"
            const lastDot = str.lastIndexOf('.');
            const lastComma = str.lastIndexOf(',');
            const lastApostrophe = str.lastIndexOf("'");
            const lastIndex = Math.max(lastDot, lastComma, lastApostrophe);

            // If no punctuation, remove any stray spaces and return
            if (lastIndex === -1) {
              return str.replace(/[.,'\s]/g, '');
            }

            // Extract parts
            const before = str.slice(0, lastIndex).replace(/[.,'\s]/g, '');
            const after = str.slice(lastIndex + 1).replace(/[.,'\s]/g, '');

            // If the after part is 1 or 2 digits, treat as decimal
            if (after.length > 0 && after.length <= 2) {
              return `${before}.${after}`;
            }

            // Otherwise treat as integer with thousands separator removed
            return before + after;
          }

          normalisedPrice = processNumberString(rawPriceString)

          window.EG_INFO["44283860353197"] = {

  <style>
    .disclosure__button {
      background-color: transparent;
      border: none;
      padding: 0;
      font-weight: var(--weight-book);
    }
    .hdr__mobile__nav .CountryList a {
      padding: 0;
    }
    .hdr__mobile__nav .disclosure__button {
      padding: 15px;
    }
    .disclosure__button:focus-visible {
      outline:1px auto -webkit-focus-ring-color;
    }
    .disclosure__button .icon {
      width: 12px;
    }

    #ge-switcher-desktop .disclosure {
      width: max-content;
    }

    .CountryList {
      position: absolute;
      z-index: 999;
      background-color: white;
      padding: 20px;
      max-height: 40vh;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
      width: 50vw;
      margin: 0;
      max-width: 300px;
      min-width: 250px;
      overflow-y: auto;
      scrollbar-color: #e4e4e4;
      top: 100%;
      scrollbar-width: thin;
      box-shadow: rgba(99, 99, 99, 0.2) 0px 2px 8px 0px;
    }

    #ge-switcher-mobile .CountryList {
      left: 0;
      transform: none;
    }

    #ge-switcher-desktop {
      position: relative;
    }

    @media screen and (max-width: 1113px) {
      #ge-switcher-desktop .disclosure {
        max-width: 25vw;
      }
    }

    #ge-switcher-mobile .disclosure {
      position: relative;
    }
    #ge-switcher-mobile .CountryList {
      bottom: 100%;
      top: unset;
    }

    .CountryList li {
      display: block !important;
      text-align: center;
      padding: 10px 0;
    }

    #ge-switcher-mobile .CountryList li {
      text-align: left;
    }

    ::-webkit-scrollbar {
      width: 12px;
      height: 12px;
    }

    ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
      background: #f5f5f5;
      border-radius: 10px;
    }

    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
      border-radius: 10px;
      background: #ccc;
    }

    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
      background: #999;
    }

    /* mobile nav */
    .mobile-navigation .CountryList {
      max-height: 30vh;
      margin-left: -18px;
    }

    .mobile-navigation .disclosure__item {
      width: 100% !important;
      padding-left: 0;
    }

    .mobile-navigation .disclosure__button {
      padding-left: 0px;
    }
  </style>
  <script>
    class LocalizationForm extends HTMLElement {
      constructor() {
        super()
        this.elements = {
          input: this.querySelector('input[name="locale_code"], input[name="country_code"]'),
          button: this.querySelector("button"),
          panel: this.querySelector("ul")
        }
        this.elements.button.addEventListener("click", this.openSelector.bind(this))
        this.elements.button.addEventListener("focusout", this.closeSelector.bind(this))
        this.addEventListener("keyup", this.onContainerKeyUp.bind(this))

        this.querySelectorAll("a").forEach((item) =>
          item.addEventListener("click", this.onItemClick.bind(this))
        )
      }

      hidePanel() {
        this.elements.button.setAttribute("aria-expanded", "false")
        this.elements.panel.setAttribute("hidden", true)
      }

      onContainerKeyUp(event) {
        if (event.code.toUpperCase() !== "ESCAPE") return

        this.hidePanel()
        this.elements.button.focus()
      }

      onItemClick(event) {
        event.preventDefault()
        const form = this.querySelector("form")
        this.elements.input.value = event.currentTarget.dataset.value
        if (form) form.submit()
      }

      openSelector() {
        this.elements.button.focus()
        this.elements.panel.toggleAttribute("hidden")
        this.elements.button.setAttribute(
          "aria-expanded",
          (this.elements.button.getAttribute("aria-expanded") === "false").toString()
        )
      }

      closeSelector(event) {
        const shouldClose = event.relatedTarget && event.relatedTarget.nodeName === "BUTTON"
        if (event.relatedTarget === null || shouldClose) {
          this.hidePanel()
        }
      }
    }
    customElements.define("localization-form", LocalizationForm)
  </script>

</header>
</custom-header>

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.6.0/jquery.min.js" integrity="sha512-894YE6QWD5I59HgZOGReFYm4dnWc1Qt5NtvYSaNcOP+u1T9qYdvdihz0PPSiiqn/+/3e7Jo4EaG7TubfWGUrMQ==" crossorigin="anonymous" referrerpolicy="no-referrer" aria-hidden="true" aria-live="off"></script>

<script aria-hidden="true" aria-live="off">
  function addqty(itemid) {
    fieldName = $(itemid).data("fieldkey")
    var currentVal = parseInt(
      $(".minicart_qtybox")
        .find("input[data-id='" + fieldName + "']")
        .val()
    )
    // If is not undefined
    if (!isNaN(currentVal)) {
      // Increment
      $(".minicart_qtybox")
        .find("input[data-id='" + fieldName + "']")
        .val(currentVal + 1)
    } else {
      // Otherwise put a 0 there
      $(".minicart_qtybox")
        .find("input[data-id='" + fieldName + "']")
        .val(1)
    }
    $(".js-qty__adjust").trigger("change")
  }
  function minusqty(itemid) {
    fieldName = $(itemid).data("fieldkey")
    var currentVal = parseInt(
      $(".minicart_qtybox")
        .find("input[data-id='" + fieldName + "']")
        .val()
    )

    // If it isn't undefined or its greater than 0
    if (!isNaN(currentVal) && currentVal > 0) {
      // Decrement one
      $(".minicart_qtybox")
        .find("input[data-id='" + fieldName + "']")
        .val(currentVal - 1)
    } else {
      // Otherwise put a 0 there
      $(".minicart_qtybox")
        .find("input[data-id='" + fieldName + "']")
        .val(1)
    }
    $(".js-qty__adjust").trigger("change")
  }
</script>

<script>
$(document).ready(function() {
    var $triggerButton = $('.product-shop-size-guide-trigger');
    var $popup = $('.size-guide-popup');
    var $popupCloseButton = $popup.find('.popup-close');
    function trapFocus(event) {
        var focusableElements = $popup.find('a, button, input, select, textarea, [tabindex], [img]');
        var firstFocusableElement = focusableElements.first();
        var lastFocusableElement = focusableElements.last();

        if (event.key === 'Tab') {
            if (event.shiftKey) { // Shift + Tab
                if (document.activeElement === firstFocusableElement[0]) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    lastFocusableElement.focus();
                }
            } else { // Tab
                if (document.activeElement === lastFocusableElement[0]) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    firstFocusableElement.focus();
                }
            }
        } else if (event.key === 'Escape' || event.keyCode === 27) { // Close the popup on Escape key press
            event.preventDefault();
            event.stopPropagation();
            closePopup();
        }
    }
    function closePopup() {
        $popup.removeClass('active');
        $(document).off('keydown', trapFocus);
        setTimeout(function() {
            if ($triggerButton.length) {
                $triggerButton.focus();
            }
        }, 10);
    }
    $(document).on('keydown', trapFocus);
    $popupCloseButton.on('click', function() {
        closePopup();
    });
    $triggerButton.on('click', function() {
        $popup.addClass('active');
        $(document).on('keydown', trapFocus);
    });
});

</script>
  </div>

  
<div class="measurements-popup popup">
  <div class="display-table">
    <div class="display-table-cell">
      <div class="popup-box js-stop-propagation">
        <div class="popup-close js-class" data-js-class="[
		{
			&quot;target_selector&quot;:&quot;.measurements-popup&quot;,
			&quot;class_name&quot;: &quot;active&quot;,
			&quot;class_action&quot;: &quot;remove&quot;
		},
		{
			&quot;target_selector&quot;:&quot;body&quot;,
			&quot;class_name&quot;: &quot;scroll-lock&quot;,
			&quot;class_action&quot;: &quot;remove&quot;
		}
	]"></div>
        <div class="popup-stage">
          <img class="block-fullwidth lazyload" alt="" data-src="" width="100%" height="100%">
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

        <input type="email" value="" name="email" placeholder="Enter Email Address" id="k_id_email" class="subscribe-form-email js-footer-subscribe-form-email" pattern="[a-z0-9._%+-]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\.[a-z]{2,3}$" required="" aria-describedby="emailHelp">
        <span id="emailHelp" class="sr-only">
          Enter a valid email address, e.g., name@example.com

          Sign up
        </button>
        <div class="subscribe-form-messages">
          <div role="alert" class="success_message" id="success" style="display:none;"></div>
        <div role="alert" class="error_message" id="error" style="display:none;"></div>
        </div>
      </form>
      <script>
          function validateEmail(event) {
            var emailInput = document.getElementById("k_id_email");
            var successMessage = document.getElementById("success");
            var errorMessage = document.getElementById("error");

            var emailPattern = /^[a-z0-9._%+-]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\.[a-z]{2,4}$/i;

            if (!emailPattern.test(emailInput.value)) {
              event.preventDefault();
              successMessage.style.display = "none";
              errorMessage.style.display = "block";
              errorMessage.innerHTML = "Invalid Email!";
              emailInput.setAttribute("aria-invalid", "true");
              emailInput.focus();
            } else {
              errorMessage.style.display = "none";
              successMessage.style.display = "block";
              emailInput.removeAttribute("aria-invalid");
            }
          }
        </script>

<script aria-hidden="true" aria-live="off">


    const accountCloseButton = document.querySelectorAll(".mini-account-close")[0];
    const accountTriggerButton = document.querySelectorAll(".hdr--desktop .hdr__account")[0];
    const body = document.body;
    const hdrBagDesktopButton = document.querySelector('.hdr--desktop .hdr__bag--desktop');
    const searchTriggerButton = document.querySelector("#search_btn_nav");
    const focusOnAccountClose = () => {
        setTimeout(() => {
            accountCloseButton.focus();
        }, 100);
    };

    const focusOnAccountTrigger = () => {
        setTimeout(() => {
            accountTriggerButton.focus();
        }, 100);
    };
    document.addEventListener('keydown', (event) => {
        if (event.key === 'Escape' || event.keyCode === 27) {
          if (body.classList.contains('mini-account-open')) {
            focusOnAccountTrigger();
          }
          else if (body.classList.contains('mini-cart-open')) {
            hdrBagDesktopButton.focus();
          }
          else if (body.classList.contains('search-bar-open')) {
            searchTriggerButton.focus();
          }
        }
        if (event.key === 'Enter') {
         if (body.classList.contains('search-bar-open')) {
          setTimeout(() => {
            searchTriggerButton.focus();
            }, 100);
          }
        }
    });


   var previousWasSearch = false;
   document.addEventListener("keydown", function(event) {
     if(event.keyCode === 27){
       $("body").removeClass("search-bar-open"),$("body").removeClass("mini-cart-open"),$("body").removeClass("mini-account-open"),$("body").removeClass("scroll-lock"),$("li.dropdown").removeClass("site-nav--active-dropdown");
       if (previousWasSearch == true){
         document.getElementById("search-bar-trigger-desktop").focus();
         previousWasSearch = false;
       }
     }
   });
   $( document ).ready(function() {
     $(".site-nav__link").focus(function(e){
       e.preventDefault();
       $(this).closest('li.dropdown').addClass('site-nav--active-dropdown').siblings().removeClass('site-nav--active-dropdown');
     });
     $("#logo a").focus(function(e){ $("body").removeClass("search-bar-open"),$("body").removeClass("mini-cart-open"),$("body").removeClass("mini-account-open"),$("li.dropdown").removeClass("site-nav--active-dropdown"); });
     $("#cart .mini-account-trigger-desktop").focus(function(e){
       e.preventDefault(),$("body").removeClass("search-bar-open"),$("body").removeClass("mini-cart-open"),$("body").removeClass("scroll-lock"),$("li.dropdown").removeClass("site-nav--active-dropdown");
       $(this).keyup(function(e){
         if(e.keyCode === 13) { window.location.href = "https://staud.clothing/account/"; }
       });
     });
     $("#cart .search-bar-trigger-desktop").focus(function(e){
       e.preventDefault(),$("body").removeClass("mini-cart-open"),$("body").removeClass("mini-account-open"),$("body").removeClass("scroll-lock"),$("li.dropdown").removeClass("site-nav--active-dropdown");
       $(this).keyup(function(e){
         if(e.keyCode === 13) { focusSearchBar(),$("#cart .search-bar-trigger-desktop").trigger("click"); }
       });
       document.getElementById("searchbarInput").focus();
     });
     function focusSearchBar(){
       setTimeout(function(){
         document.getElementById("searchbarInput").focus();
         previousWasSearch = true;
       }, 1000);
     }
     $("span.search-bar-trigger-mobile.navbar-nav-pillar-mobile.js-class").focus(function(e){
       e.preventDefault(),$("body").removeClass("mini-cart-open"),$("body").removeClass("mini-account-open"),$("body").removeClass("scroll-lock"),$("li.dropdown").removeClass("site-nav--active-dropdown");

       $(this).keyup(function(e){
         if(e.keyCode === 13) { $(this).trigger("click"); }
       });
       document.getElementById("searchbarInput").focus();
     });
     $("#cart .mini-cart-trigger-desktop").focus(function(e){
       e.preventDefault(),$("body").removeClass("search-bar-open"),$("body").removeClass("mini-cart-open"),$("body").removeClass("scroll-lock"),$("li.dropdown").removeClass("site-nav--active-dropdown");
       $(this).keyup(function(e){
         if(e.keyCode === 13) { $(this).trigger("click"); }
       });
     });
     $(".home-option-banners a").focus(function(e){ e.preventDefault(),$("body").removeClass("search-bar-open"),$("body").removeClass("mini-cart-open"),$("body").removeClass("mini-account-open"),$("body").removeClass("scroll-lock"),$("li.dropdown").removeClass("site-nav--active-dropdown"); });
     $(".mini-cart-item-remove").focus(function(e){ $(this).keyup(function(e){ if(e.keyCode === 13) { $(this).trigger("click"); } }); });
   $('#searchbarInput').click(function() {
   			$('.search-bar-form').addClass("activeSearch");
  });
     $('span.search-bar-trigger-mobile.navbar-nav-pillar-mobile.js-class').click(function() {
   			$('.search-bar-form').removeClass("activeSearch");
  });
   });</script>


    

    


  <script aria-hidden="true" aria-live="off">
    var iwish_shop = "staud-clothing.myshopify.com";
    var iwish_pro_template = true;
    var iwish_cid = "";
    //Add to Wishlist - Product Page Text
    var iwish_added_txt = 'Added in Wishlist';
    var iwish_add_txt = 'Add to Wishlist';
    //Add to Wishlist - Collection Page Text
    var iwish_added_txt_col = 'Added in Wishlist';
    var iwish_add_txt_col = 'Add to Wishlist';
    //Quick View - Classes
    var iwish_qvButton = '.quick_view';
    var iwish_qvWrapper = '.reveal-modal';
  </script>

  
  <script src="https://cdn.myshopapps.com/iwish/iwishlist.js" async="" aria-hidden="true" aria-live="off"></script>
  

  <script aria-hidden="true" aria-live="off">
    jQuery(document).ready(function () {
      jQuery("a[href='/apps/iwish']").click(function (e) {
        if (typeof Storage !== "undefined") {
          e.preventDefault()
          iWishPost("/apps/iwish", { iwishlist: JSON.stringify(iWishlistmain), cId: iwish_cid })
        }
      })
      jQuery(".iWishAdd").click(function () {
        var iWishvId = jQuery(this).parents(iwishWrapperClass).find(iWishVarSelector).val()
        iwish_add(jQuery(this), iWishvId)
        return false
      })
      jQuery(".iWishAddColl").click(function () {
        var iWishvId = jQuery(this).attr("data-variant")
        iwish_addCollection(jQuery(this), iWishvId)
        return false
      })
      iwishCheckColl()
    })
    function iwishCheckColl() {
      if (jQuery(".iwishcheck").length > 0) {
        jQuery(".iwishcheck").each(function () {
          var iWishvId = jQuery(this).attr("data-variant")
          var iWishpId = jQuery(this).attr("data-product")
          if (isInWishlist(iWishpId, iWishvId)) {
            jQuery(this).addClass("iwishAdded").html(iwish_added_txt_col)
          }
          jQuery(this).removeClass("iwishcheck")
        })
      }
    }
  </script>
